recipes.title: Cherry Blueberry Muffins
steps.one: Grease twelve regular sized muffin cups well with butter or oil.
steps.two: In a large bowl, combine the flours, baking powder, baking soda, sugar, lemon zest and salt.
steps.three: Make a well in the center of the ingredients and set aside.
steps.four: In another bowl, combine the yogurt with the lemon juice.
steps.five: Add the eggs, one at a time, whisking well after each addition.
steps.six: Now add the vanilla and almond butter and whisk until well combined.
steps.seven: Pour this mixture into the dry ingredients and stir just to combine.
steps.eight: Gently fold in the cherries and blueberries.
steps.nine: Divide the batter evenly into the prepared muffin cups and bake in a preheat 350 degree oven for 20 - 25 minutes, or until a cake tester or toothpick comes out clean.
steps.ten: Leave the muffins in the pan for 10 minutes and then transfer to a wire rack to cool.Yields 12 berry filled muffins.
